name: customHelloTheme
description: Application theme based on Bonita 'Flatly' theme. (see http://bootswatch.com/flatly/)

scripts.build: node-sass --precision 8 --output-style compressed --omit-source-map-url true --include-path ./node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/stylesheets/ --include-path ./node_modules/font-awesome-sass/assets/stylesheets/ src/scss/main.scss target/theme.noprefix.css && postcss target/theme.noprefix.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -b "last 2 versions" -o dist/theme.css
